channel.description: Recent content in changelog on Blog | Peyronnet Group

item.title: Synapsy Write v1.3.0 Changelog
item.description: We are excited to announce that Synapsy Write v1.3 is now available. This version brings UI improvements and fixes. Note: This changelog also includes changes made in hotfixes (1.3.1, 1.3.2) Changelog New Add new button styles Create button is now disabled if no prompt is given Improved code for View page Added locales for View page Improved layout Added scale effect Fixed Fixed Learn More button Fixed space issue with navbar Fixed display issue on mobile devices Updated Improved landing page Updated footer Updated next config Updated dependencies Launch Click here to launch the app.

item.title: Synapsy Write v1.2.0 Changelog
item.description: We are excited to announce that Synapsy Write v1.2 is now available with several new features and improvements. Changelog New Added the possibility to edit API Key Added export and import buttons Added locales Added error messages Added footer Added home page content Fixed Fixed an issue with API Key panel Fixed scrolling issue (#2) Launch Click here to launch the app. We hope you enjoy using Synapsy Write v1.2 and we look forward to hearing your feedback.

item.title: Synapsy Write v1.2.0 Changelog
item.description: We are excited to announce that Synapsy Write v1.1 is now available with several new features and improvements. Changelog New Switched to URL params Added new philosophy options (essay basic and complex) Improved the look of results Added the possibility to select the model Added stats section Added print and copy button Fixed Fixed an issue with item card in history Launch Click here to launch the app.
